author: Grillribba
install_msg: Thanks for installing MuteList. Use `[p]help mutelist`.
name: MuteList
short: List muted users (roles configurable) with reasons.
description: Configurable set of 'mute' roles. Lists all members holding any of those roles and shows the reason (stored or pulled from Audit Log).
end_user_data_statement: Stores member IDs and mute metadata (reason, moderator ID, timestamps).
